item.description: 1. You Shall Invest in Power ‚ÄúIt is a curious thing, Harry, but perhaps those who are best suited to power are those who have never sought it, they just buy it with a credit card.
2. You Shall Become a Veteran Is the game Pay to Win? Is the dark side stronger? ‚Äî Young Padawan asking reasonable questions.
3. You Shall Not Whine About P2W Good… use your aggressive feelings, player. Let the hate flow through you. ‚ÄîDarth Voldemort pushing you to the Dark Side
4. You Shall Whine About Matchmaking There are various types of players in the game, and some are always ahead of you.

5. You Shall Not Gamble… Often ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll bet thirty-seven Galleons, fifteen Gems, three Gold Coins,‚Äù said Fred as he and George quickly pooled all their money,‚Äú that Ireland wins ‚Äî but Viktor Krum gets the Snitch.
6. You Shall Not Crave Thy Neighbor’s Cosmetics Good resource management skills would allow you to collect a variety of cosmetics, including some premium ones.
7. You Shall Hoard Like a Dragon There are many resources. It can be confusing, but it’s easy once you understand the true cost of power in Magic Awakened.
8. You Shall Use Meta Decks Unlike many Collectible Card Games (CCG), you can acquire every card in this game in a reasonable amount of time, for free.
9. You Shall Upgrade Strategically “Ravenclaws are a bunch of nerds. You overthink everything.” ‚ÄîShut up. There is a lot of luck involved in resource allocation.
10. You Shall Not Pass üßôüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Yes, this commandment is just a nerdy joke. Made for fun. Burnout will destroy you.
Magic Awakened F2P Guide This is a fan work, freely given to the community. Contact creators on Discord, GitHub or Google if you want to help or change anything.
